data.actual_result: You can't move the server down any further.
data.expected_result: The list scrolls down as you move the server down.
data.short_description: Unable to scroll down server list (when moving another server) when there is a mention on a server currently not visible on the bar
data.steps_to_repro: - Attempt to move a server down this list (past the list you can see) - Realize you can't.
